description: This show is all about the World Of Warcraft in game economy, and how to make vast amounts of gold through the auction house.
title: Call To Auction

episodes.title: Episode 54: Euripides misses a show
episodes.description:
MP3

This week, Namssob and Stede cover for Euripides, who was out with a broken brain.

Here's the RSS feed for our episodes, and here's the iTunes link. You can also find us on iTunes by searching for "call to auction". To ask a question, simply email calltoauction@gmail.com!

We're also now on YouTube. Subscribe to our channel for live shows streamed from Google Hangouts On Air or watch the raw unedited audio from previous shows at http://www.youtube.com/calltoauction

The opening track is called Change.
~ This feed item is from http://calltoauction.blogspot.com

episodes.title: Episode 53: Outefficienting the Competition
episodes.description:
MP3

This week, Euripedes and Namssob make up words like outefficienting in order to answer some emails on our relatively slow news week. Specifically, we demonstrate how to make smart decisions about Undermine Journal pricing data as well as spotting trends on various commodities.

Here's the RSS feed for our episodes, and here's the iTunes link. You can also find us on iTunes by searching for "call to auction". To ask a question, simply email calltoauction@gmail.com!

We're also now on YouTube. Subscribe to our channel for live shows streamed from Google Hangouts On Air or watch the raw unedited audio from previous shows at http://www.youtube.com/calltoauction

The opening track is called Change.
~ This feed item is from http://calltoauction.blogspot.com

episodes.title: Episode 52: Is there gold in an alternate universe?
episodes.description:
MP3

This week, Euripedes and Namssob finally run through the email queue and we find out that there's not really anything special at the end of the queue. We cover everything from TSM to pricing strategies, specifically for Lightning Steel Ingots. Listen to the show for more details!

One of the questions dealt with starting to use TSM from scratch, and Olivia Grace from Wow Insider did a nice starter post and its located here.

Here's the RSS feed for our episodes, and here's the iTunes link. You can also find us on iTunes by searching for "call to auction". To ask a question, simply email calltoauction@gmail.com!

We're also now on YouTube. Subscribe to our channel for live shows streamed from Google Hangouts On Air or watch the raw unedited audio from previous shows at http://www.youtube.com/calltoauction

The opening track is called Change.
~ This feed item is from http://calltoauction.blogspot.com

episodes.title: Episode 51: Improvise, Adapt, Overcome
episodes.description:
MP3

This week, Euripedes and Namssob discuss adapting strategies to constantly changing market conditions, specifically including handling price reset attempts (which is basically developing your strategy when someone else tries to control a market).

Here's the RSS feed for our episodes, and here's the iTunes link. You can also find us on iTunes by searching for "call to auction". To ask a question, simply email calltoauction@gmail.com!

We're also now on YouTube. Subscribe to our channel for live shows streamed from Google Hangouts On Air or watch the raw unedited audio from previous shows at http://www.youtube.com/calltoauction

episodes.title: Episode 50: Beginner's Tips
episodes.description:
MP3

This week, Euripedes and Stede address some of our emails that all seem to ask about gold-making with low (or relatively lower) capital. We also talk briefly about the 5.3 PTR, but as with anything on the PTR, anything and everything could change before 5.3 comes out.

Here's the RSS feed for our episodes, and here's the iTunes link. You can also find us on iTunes by searching for "call to auction". To ask a question, simply email calltoauction@gmail.com!

We're also now on Youtube. Subscribe to our channel for live shows streamed from Google Hangouts On Air or watch the raw unedited audio from previous shows at http://www.youtube.com/user/calltoauction

episodes.description:
MP3

This week, Namssob and Stede talk about the auction house conditions of the initial days of patch 5.2 and go into detail on some of their strategies early on during this patch. Specifically, we talk about the initial changes in the shuffle.

Here's the RSS feed for our episodes, and here's the iTunes link. You can also find us on iTunes by searching for "call to auction". To ask a question, simply email calltoauction@gmail.com!

episodes.title: Episode 48: Blizzard Q&A
episodes.description:
MP3

This week we review the answers we received from Blizzard regarding their views on the auction house, professions, and other related topics regarding the WoW economy.

The topic on the Consortium forums where all the Q&A was posted and the discussion is ongoing is here: http://stormspire.net/general-discussion/10090-blizzard-talks-about-economy-auction-house-professions.html

Namssob mentioned a link in this show regarding Global market data using the "basket" rating:
http://www.wowuction.com/Global

Here's the RSS feed for our episodes, and here's the iTunes link. You can also find us on iTunes by searching for "call to auction". To ask a question, simply email calltoauction@gmail.com!

We're also now on Youtube. Subscribe to our channel for live shows streamed from Google Hangouts On Air or watch the raw unedited audio from previous shows at http://www.youtube.com/user/calltoauction

~ This feed item is from http://calltoauction.blogspot.com

episodes.title: Episode 47: We're So Ready for 5.2
episodes.description:
MP3

We're sneaking this episode in before 5.2 is supposed to drop on Tuesday. (We could be wrong, but all signs point to probably.) We cover some of the last-minute changes to the PTR as well as handle some advice for the initial week after a new patch.


Here's the RSS feed for our episodes, and here's the iTunes link. You can also find us on iTunes by searching for "call to auction". To ask a question, simply email calltoauction@gmail.com!

episodes.title: Episode 46: Patch 5.2 Roundup
episodes.description:
MP3

This week is a news round-up featuring recommendations for the upcoming 5.2 patch and some catch-up advice. This podcast was originally recorded on Google Hangouts On Air and broadcast live through Youtube. This was our first attempt at using this new system and Euripedes experienced some lag near the end, but we're looking to do live broadcasts from here on in if we can get all the kinks out of this system.

Here's the RSS feed for our episodes, and here's the iTunes link. You can also find us on iTunes by searching for "call to auction". To ask a question, simply email calltoauction@gmail.com!
